name: @polyneural/mcpb
description: AI Memory Platform with persistent knowledge graph storage via MCP Bundle
long_description: PolyNeural.ai provides a scalable AI Memory Platform that enables persistent knowledge graph storage across devices and sessions. This MCP Bundle allows AI agents to maintain long-term memory through a multi-tenant knowledge graph system with full-text search, real-time updates, and comprehensive relationship management. Perfect for storing technical insights, user preferences, solution patterns, and project context that persist across conversations.

tools.name: create_entities
tools.description: Create entities in the knowledge graph for AI memory storage with semantic types

tools.name: create_relations
tools.description: Create typed relationships between entities in the knowledge graph

tools.name: search_nodes
tools.description: Search for nodes in the knowledge graph using full-text search

tools.name: open_nodes
tools.description: Retrieve specific entities by their names or IDs

tools.name: read_graph
tools.description: Read the complete knowledge graph structure

tools.name: add_observations
tools.description: Add new observations to existing entities

tools.name: delete_entities
tools.description: Delete entities and their associated relationships

tools.name: get_entities_by_identifiers
tools.description: Get entities by their names or IDs

tools.name: get_entity_relationships
tools.description: Get all incoming and outgoing relationships for an entity

tools.name: get_entities_by_date_range
tools.description: Get entities created or updated within a specific date range

tools.name: get_recent_changes
tools.description: Get recent changes to the knowledge graph within specified hours

tools.name: get_trending_entities

tools.name: get_frecency_entities
